All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AppTest
Unit test for migration-library.
CLI
Class for working with CLI utility
ConnectionManager
Class for connecting to postgres database This class provides methods to establish and retrieve a connection to the database
FileVersion
Class used to determine the version of a .sql file
HistoryTableGeneration
the class is used to generate the migration_history tables (similar to flyway_scema_history) and migration_lock (to prevent simultaneous migrations)
JsonReport
Class for saving reports in json format
Main
Class for demonstrating the work of the library
MigrationExecutor
Class for executing SQL queries from a file list
MigrationFileReader
The class is designed to work with files: search for files with the required prefix, extract a script from a file
MigrationManager
Using this class you can find out information about migration: version, all versions, latest report, all reports
MigrationReport
Simple DTO for creating reports and getting information from migration_history table
MigrationRollBackManager
Class for working with migration rollbacks, you can roll back to one version or to a specific one, undo files can be in resources or the path to the directory must be specified
MigrationTool
Class for performing migrations Migration files can be located in resources, or you must specify the path to the directory in which they are located
PropertiesUtils
Class for extracting data from application.properties
RollbackUtils
Class containing methods for rolling back migrations
TestMigrationFileReader
Unit test for class MigrationFileReader
TestMigrationManager
Class for testing receiving versions and migrations;
